item.description:
Let's go get some early holiday shopping done at the 14th Annual “Original” Castleberry Faire

Location: Shriner’s Auditorium

Show Hours: Saturday 10-5
Directions: From 93 take Exit 39
Indoor Event
Admission $7.00*

*They off coupons for all their shows, the coupon is for $2.00 for up to 6 people I will print out enough coupons for all of us to get the discount.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be to the right of the entrance into the Auditorium.
item.name: Castleberry Faire
